/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, providing a stark contrast to the clear blue sky overhead. High above, power lines stretch across the scene, a common sight in urban landscapes. The sun shines brightly in the top right corner of the image, casting a warm glow over the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, adding depth and perspective to the view. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and bushes standing out against the blue sky.
